Articles.Content: I was thinking that it would be a good idea to have instruments that would instruments that could be used as an input in the KAL-1000 controller. For example, imagine a pitot tube that could be configured so that as the IAS of your craft increases, an airbrake deploys more to keep your speed constant; or an accelerometer that locks your controls if the g-force become too high. These are the only things I can think of right now but I'm sure some other people may have other ideas.
Yup I was thinking the same thing, the existing pressure sensor could be used as an altimeter, throw in compass and attitude readers (from the ch-j3) and we could potentialy have our own autopilots.
